text: kya logon ko is baat par aashchary ho raha hai ki hamane unhee mein se ek aadamee kee or prakaashana kee ki logon ko sachet kar do aur jo log maan len, unako shubh samaachaar de do ki unake lie rab ke paas shaashvat sachcha unnat sthaan hai? inakaar karanevaale kahane lage, "nissandeh yah ek khula jaadoogar hai.
